alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 11:26PM AKST until January 29 at 7:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulation of 12 to 24 inches. Blowing snow due to winds up to 40 mph will significantly reduce visibility. * WHERE...Northeast Prince William Sound, Valdez, Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow in Valdez and Thompson Pass is expected to persist through at least Tuesday morning. Heavy snow may result in over a foot of accumulation through sunrise Monday. Total snow accumulations are expected to be in the range of 36 to 50 inches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
